meanings.definition: A device used to curl or straighten hair.
meanings.sent1: I bought a new frizzer to style my hair for the party.
meanings.sent2: The hair salon uses a frizzer to create beautiful curls.
meanings.sent3: The frizzer hummed happily as it worked its magic on my hair.
meanings.sent4: Her frizzer was like a magic wand, transforming her hair into a work of art.
meanings.sent5: The frizzer gently twisted my hair, leaving it perfectly styled.

meanings.definition: A person who creates frizz in hair.
meanings.sent1: My sister is a frizzer, always giving me wild hairdos.
meanings.sent2: The frizzer at the salon gave me a unique frizzed look.
meanings.sent3: The frizzer joked that they could turn anyone into a lion with their skills.
meanings.sent4: She was a frizzer by nature, making every hairstyle stand out.
meanings.sent5: The frizzer's touch turned my hair into a fluffy cloud of curls.

meanings.definition: A hairstyle characterized by frizzed hair.
meanings.sent1: Her frizzer hairstyle was the talk of the town.
meanings.sent2: The 80s were known for their iconic frizzer looks.
meanings.sent3: He proudly rocked his frizzer hair, embracing the unique style.
meanings.sent4: The frizzer hairstyle was a rebellious statement against smooth hair trends.
meanings.sent5: The frizzer look added a touch of fun and flair to her overall appearance.
